response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I suggest we discuss a price that reflects its worth. Considering the product's quality and your anticipated use, I propose a price of $120. This allows us to reach a fair agreement while ensuring you receive a product that meets your expectations. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.", "product_price": 120}
